channel.title: Making npc's talk aloud
channel.description: im having trouble making an npc talk aloud i followed several guides none seemed to work i searched thw whole "moo" code thing and its not under the npchandler i used a prodigyscape base any help would be appreciated

item.title: Making npc's talk aloud
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

add this to your npchandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCIDHERE) { if (misc.random(30) == 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOUR TEXT HERE!"; } }

Read full topic
